api_list.name: clinicalcheck
api_list.description: It takes input as text and classify text into clinical and non clinical classes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://clinicaltext.p.rapidapi.com/clinicalcheck"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clinicaltext.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://clinicaltext.p.rapidapi.com/clinicalcheck"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
